article_title: Trump Speech Costa Mesa California LIVE STREAM
article_text:
Donald Trump will hold his second rally of the day at the Pacific Amphitheater of the OC Fair & Event Center in Costa Mesa, California.

The event is scheduled to begin at 7:00 PM PDT.

Watch above, via Right Side Broadcasting.

[image via screengrab]
